pages.text: Structural Glass can be used into any multiblocks as long as:$(li)They are not part of the multiblock's frame.$(li2)An exception being the $(l:thermal_evaporation)Thermal Evaporation Plant$(/l) where they cannot be part of the frame nor the base.
$(li)The multiblock is not a reactor, in which case, $(l:misc_blocks/reactor_glass)Reactor Glass$(/l) must be used if you wish for a glass wall.
